rigs kyi bu khag/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas kyang gisakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab tug zhig pa//
dang 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid ' byed pas rnam pa la rtsod na/ 'i bsod
nams ches mang du 'pho ko/ rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa da dag thams cad snga phyi'ang par ma'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas par gyur la/ de dganam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'gazhig gis rimar byasu/ bkur stir
byus phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ ga ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams// rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phar lam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'bye'o
0/ @#/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am// gas kyi bu mo ga nganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a de gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad ba dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab tug zhog
bdang/ grel pa dang/ ma par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la khyad pas rnam par spyodan/

zla pa'i bsod nams ches mang du'apha'ago/ ba 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis mas can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi mdabang mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ blag med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la// de dag nag 'tsho bar du bzhugs la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas// bkur stir byas/
bu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam dusams/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi 'tsho ba bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs panang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas
kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab tu gzhag pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/
ca rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag pa ston pa dang/ shes rab kyi 'o tu na ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par sbyongan/ 'i bsod namasams nad du'aphel//

la rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyid pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med pas mi'i lus thob bar gyuge/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyag par gyur la// de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bu dud du byas//
mchod par byas te/ dag ba'i rtsa ba de yang blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
nams de'i rgyus nang du'apha' lan/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi
bu khag rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gazhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad ba dang/ rnam par gzhog pa dang/ rab tu gzhag pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/ rnam
ngar khyad dang ( gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yi de la byed pas rnam par sbyodan 'i bsod nams ches mang du
'phelago thabyorasal te stong gsum gyi steng chen po 'jig rtenagyi khams kyisems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi chad par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla ra/
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la// de dag nam 'tsho'i kher du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu sa/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas
blo/bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge brtsi ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu yos su bsngos na/ 'byar de ji snyam du sems// gsakyi
bu kham rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'irgyus mang du 'pha' lam// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bad bar gshegs bamang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
tharab 'byor du bas kyang rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rag tu gzhog pa dang/
'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yod la byed pas rnam par ngan/ de'i bsod nams
zachos mang du 'phar 'go/ rab 'byor gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la// de dag rigs kyi bu ka/
rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ tshad med pa ba'i la rab tu bkod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms/
bar 'ajug ba bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ mngon pa shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tubakodapa dang/ lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/
phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rang byung chub 'arab tu bkodapa dang/ blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod//
dag pa'i rtsa ba de yang blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'khyer de ji snyam du sems/ gos kyi khu 'ag/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams pa'i rgyus mang du
'ba' la// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// khacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang gs kyi bu 'am/ gso kyi bu mo gang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhog kha dang/ rab tu gzhog pa dang/ 'grel ba dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed
pa dang yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal tagling bzhi pa'i 'jigartan gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyed par mi'i
mi'i lus thob bar gyur la// de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i lasakyi 'a mal rab tu bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhal rab tu
bkad pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i

'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tung kod pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rang byang chub la

rab tu bkod pa dang/ bla na ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de jisnyam du
sams gisakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams pa'i rgyus mang du babs lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasamang ngo// bde bar gshegs bamang ngo// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas kyang 'gas kyi bu kham/ gas kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan l ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/
rab tu gzhog pa dang 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston na/ 'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig
[4]/rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang rjesnyad pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyura'/ de dag rigs kyi bum/ rigs kyi bumo'abazhib gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu/
bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhil rab tu bkod pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga

la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bzhacig phyir 'ong ba'i khras bu la rab tub ked pa dang/ byim 'ing ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ grwa ces pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rang

bya nub la rab tu bkod pa dang/ blon yod ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de la nga glan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de
dzisnyam du sems/ gsakyi bu 'am/ gas kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phala'am/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dasamang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab
tugazhog pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston na/ 'i bsod nams chesamang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi
[4]/ @#// bag rten gyi khams kyis nus can gang ji sAd pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par ni lus theb par gyur la// de dag 'gas kyi bu sa// gas kyi bu me 'khazhig gis
dge ba bcu'i las kyil ma la rab tu bkodapa dang/ bsam gtan bzhil rab tu bkod pa dang/ tshad med pa bta'i rab tu bkod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyogs par 'jug pa bzhi 'ar pa tu pa ked pa
dang mngon par shes pa lnga rab tung ked pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
rab tu bkod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkadapo dang/ rang byung chu ba la rab tu bkod pa dang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ' rab tu bkodod/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
bla na red nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam dusums/ gas kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams da'i rgyus mang du 'alalag gsal
sh+tsa nga bcig ldan 'dasu 'dang ngo// bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// brtse ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'khyer dbas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi'i mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab tu gzhag pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag bar
ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang dub sel go/ rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyid pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi lus thob par

gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi la 'ab tu bkod pa dang/ tshad med ba bzhi la rab tu bkod ba dgagazugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lngal rab tu bkod pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa/
dang phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyidi la rab tu bkod pa dang/ rang byang chub la rab tub ked pa dang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu
bkod de/ ga ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla nagadang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ gis kyi bu zho pa'i bsod nams
de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang nga/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/
gsakyi bu mo ga ngang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ rnam par gzhag pa dang/ rab tu gzhog pa dang/ 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed
pa dang Da gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston na/ 'i bsod nams chos mang du ba 'a 'a// rab 'byor daltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen/
bo rnag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin to/ tsi'i nan/ don 'di ltar de bzhin gsheg
(pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyusam gtog par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chan po rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sags can gang la yang mad de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ da ni
'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs te/ dadag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyogs pa'i tsi/ sems can thams cad
gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta sta/ de dag snying rje chen po 'ab bo// de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang/ mngon par dga' bar gyur te/ de
ga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub bo// de dag gtsanam de dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ dadag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo// rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi

shes rab kyi snang ba chen po sto/ 'diltar sbyin pa'i phal tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha
la tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'i// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa dman par rdzogs par
sangs ma rgyas kyang/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ su'i gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang/ yo byadal yos su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang/ sbyin bdag gi
sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ya/panye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bsan byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bachen po don yod par khan gyi bsod snyoms la yos
su spyod par 'dod pa dang/ sems can thams cad la lam bstan par 'dod pa dang/ snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa dang/ khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams/
yongs su dga' bar 'dod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bstod par 'dodapas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun naM/

'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na yang das pa de la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs
mi dbye ste/ des nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i ri de la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtang zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o// rab 'a byor 'di lta ste/
dbas na sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yodal/ das dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che red par gyur te/ anor bu rin po che med pas dga' ba dang/ spro ba dang/ yid
blo bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/ des nor bu rin pocha de redam thag tu stor bar gyur na/ pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ rtag tu rgyun mi bcad pa/

kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin pocha de dang bral bar gyur to/ zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun du 'byung ngo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sags dpa'/
rgyan gos 'donorini bo che'o snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ni bon de stor bar yang
mi bya ste// de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyu'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la
bgyi ba thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ba lags na/ jiltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ l]
bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dgos/ yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni thos kyis ma byas/ rangasangs rgyas kyis ma byas sangs rgyas pa tse/
ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang mu mdzad d/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang/ chos kyig nas niyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/
gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos kyi dgyes dang/ nga dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas dpa' chen bo de ni shes rang
kyila'o tu zhib dang 'khrul ba yin te/ dpa'i phyi'i zhan/ rab 'byor dan 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dbon/ rang bzhin gyis stong paste/ da' 'pha' ba
med do/ longs su 'grib pamadado// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dban zhing rang bzhan gyis stong ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das

ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing/ banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur[l]
ba'ags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung yang ' la
ba 'am gos su'agrib pa med do// de bzhin nyid la 'pha'akha las/ yongs su 'grib pa med de// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am/ mos su 'grig pa med do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la
zlo 'phel ba 'am/ yongs su 'grib pa med do/ daci'i phyir zhen/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nagacig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yino/ rab 'byor gal ted skad du bshad pa la
ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sogs mi 'jug zhing ma'ageng mi 'jigasam sngang/ skag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po dan phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyangs la gan
tha pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o/// shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin
pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya'i gsum pa////rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/
[I]gso banyid dang/ rig lus pa nyidadang/ snying po mamachis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu shipal sbyong dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni ma yin
no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gungan ga nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
ba/ rab 'byor de namasano/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodadam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba rab 'byor dad ma yin// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stongang nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bu/ rab 'byor dan ma yin no//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ stong pa nyid las gud du stong pa nyid spyod dan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin go/ gsol pa// bcom
ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das lags/ tshor bshesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
cilags/ 'dus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasatsalags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das zhi
lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi khol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ri ba 'byor dam yin no/ 'ol 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom
ldan 'das ci 'gas/ mig shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da///
bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod das// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lca shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyi lags
lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rab 'byor danin/
yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sgra shes rab kyi par rol tu
phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcos ldan 'od s ni' gas ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
gco[']ldan 'dasaci 'gas/ ganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la sdod dam bcom ldan 'das mi 'gas/ tshos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha ro lo tu phyin pa la spyod dum/
pa//bcom ldan 'das ci bags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pal spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasaci'ags/ lca rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes
rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsa 'gas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das cigs// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan lalas ci
lags rna ba'i 'dus tarig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'adas ci 'gas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa laspyodadam/ bcom
ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ lus kyi 'dus te rag ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod
dag/ 'am ldan 'dasaci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te rag pa shes rab kyi ba la tu na ba la spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ rab 'byor don ma yin no//
zla// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ci 'gas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan/
pa 'das ci'ags/ rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod dam// bcom ldan 'das lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las phyung ba'i tshor ba shes
rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasu ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i nor bzhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dang/ bcom ldan 'das lags/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod da// bcom ldan 'das ci 'dags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
nga la sdod dam/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor di ni ma yin no// rab 'abyor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das cilogs/ su'i khams shes rab kyi
pha lo' du phyin nga la sprod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ me'i khams shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ngo la spyodadam/ bcom ldan 'das/ci lags/ rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la sbyong dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas/ nam mkha'i khams
shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das nyi lags/ ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das
cilags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das legs rnam bar shes pa shes rab kyi phar du phyin bal spyod dam/ bcos ldan 'das cil/gas/ mi dang
gzugs shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dus tsa legs/ skyo mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci ra gas/ reg
pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a sdod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas/ mo ba so rab kyi sha rol tu phyin pa la sdod dam/ bcom ldan 'das rtsilags/ srid pa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ len pa shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i gas/ srid pa shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa' spyod dam// bcom ldan 'dasacalags/ rgashishes ragaM
kyi pha rol tuphyin pa' sdod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byed kyis gsol nga/ bcom ldan 'das te/
lags sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi'akhol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha mel tu phyin pa' sdong dum
bcom ldan 'das calugs/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rib kyi
paro' du na ka spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das su gsabasam gtan gyis rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyil mo' tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ce'ags/ shes
rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsa' pa// bcom
ldan 'ad/ci' gas/ nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod dam/
bcom ldan lags lags phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi snga rol du phyon pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
ngan spyod dag bcom ldan 'das cilegs/ chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol/
tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasaci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa' spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasaci lags/ 'dus ma byas stong
ba nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam 1 bcom ldan 'dasaci 'gas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyida shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod dam/ bcom ltar 'phros/
ci lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stongapa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsa' gas/ dog ba mad pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lugs// rang bzhin stong panyid shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das rtsalags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dus ci'o gas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam 1 bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas/ mi
dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsa le/gas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha 'o tu phyin pa la spyod ngan// bsen
ldan 'das silags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes//
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'khyer de ni ma yin// rab 'byer gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas/ dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci
lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyod dag/ bcom/
ldan 'das ci logasaM// stobasalnga shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
bcom ldan 'dasAca'ags// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// btson ldan 'das ci logs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bshes
parab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsag gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 2 tshadayod
med pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprodadam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la stod dam/ bcom
ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyada shes rab kyi 'a'o tu na pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan saci 'gas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasaci lags mngon par shes pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ting nga 'dzin rnams shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasaci lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams s rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs banus rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ca'egs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
'das ci'i gas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ byams pa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyodad// bcom ldan 'dag ci'ags/ snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci' gas/ sangs rgyas kyi ches
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi 'ol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras khung shes rab kyi nga ro'atuphyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom
ldan 'das colags/ lanaci phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasacalags/ phyir mi 'ong pa de'i bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'a spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ dgra bcom pa nyid shes rab kyi bal tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha
la tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'dasucigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das cilags/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen nyid shes rab kyi pha'o tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang/ rab 'byoradon ma yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das pa'i gas/ gablugs kyi stong pa de dang/ gsog de dang/ gagob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang snying pomamachis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/
mnor ba de bzhin nyidad/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i
mtha' dang/ bsam gyis khyab ba'i byings dnga shes rab kyi kha la tun bu la spyod// bcom ldan 'adas ci lags/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyidi dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob/
nyid dang 2 rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying khomamachis pa nyid dang/ dbazhiganyidadang/ mnol ba de bzhin nyid dang/gzhan s yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos
kyi byis pa dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon yod pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dbyas de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsebanyid dang/ rig lus pa nyid dang/ snying bo ma mchis pa nyid dang/ do
ba nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang// chos kyi dbyangs dang/ tshes kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid
dang/ gang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab ba'i dbyings de shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa' spyod dam// btsonaldan 'das ci'i gas/ 'du byed kyi stong panyid dang
gso ba nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying pos mchis ba nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor bad bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan s/
yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi byings dang/ tshes kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyidi dang/ yang dag pa'i thab dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dasatsalags/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa/
dang snying pos mchis pa nyid dang/ de bzhinanyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang// chos kyi gnas
nyid dang/ chos skyon gad pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab da' de ngas da shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
sgrub/ rab 'abyor donog yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mig gi stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsobanyid dang/ rag lus pa
nyid dang/ snying bo ma mchis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyidadang/ gnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/
chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon nad pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bzhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyis pa la sngodad// bcom ldan 'das ni
lags rna ba'i stong ba nyidi dang/ gsoganyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying bo ma mchas panyid dang/ de bskyod dang/ mnar ba de bzhin
dang gzhan ma yin dang de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i byings da shes rab kyi ba la tu byin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ca' gas/ sna'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rigalus
ba nyid dang/ snying bo mamachis pa nyid dang de bzhin nyidi dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/
chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan
'das ci'i gas/ lce'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsobanyidi dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying bom mchis pa nyid dang/ d bzhi ni nyid dang/ ma nor
ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ sa skyon med pa nyid dang/
mang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyangs de shes rab kyis la tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'igs/ lus kyi stong pa nyid dang/ gsoganyid
dang gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan su lan pad bzhin nyid dang/ chos
nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang// yang dag pa'i matha' dang/ bsan gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyodad// bcon ldan 'dasA'ags/ yid kyi stong pa nyid dang/ gsoganyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying po man chis pa nyid dang/
dra bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhinanyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhiganyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa/
nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsan gyis mi khyab pa'i byings de shes rab kyi pha 'o tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ni
ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'gas// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying
pomamachis pa nyid dang/ de ba'an nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid
dang chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam bcom ldan bdasacilags/ sgra'i
stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying por mchis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mner ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan
ma yin pa de bzhin nyid du// chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab/
pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dri'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsobanyidi dad/ raga'us nganyid dang/
snying bo ma mchis panyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor bde bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas
nyid dang/ chog skyon med banyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan
'das tsalegs/ bo'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsobanyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying bo ma mchis nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid
dang/ gzhan s yin pa de bzhin nyidadang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbanges dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skon nad pa nyid dang/ gang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam
kyis ma khyab pa'i dbyis dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ reg gi stong pa nyid dang/ gsoganyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus
pa nyid dang/ snying bom mchis panyid dang/ de bzhinanyid dung/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyidabyings dang/
chos kyi gnas niyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsamagyis ma khyab ba'i dbyings dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
[b]lags/ chos kyi stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ ragalus pa nyid dang/ snying bo ma mchis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin
nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chog kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsas/
gyis mkhyab nga 'i byings de shes rab kyi phulol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni no yin no// rab 'bar gyis gsol pa// btsaldan
'das ci lags/ mi gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsoganyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying por mchis pa de dang/ de bzhi nyid
dang ma nor bad bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi ngabyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang
dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang/
gsoganyidi dang/ gsobanyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bayin
nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag nga 'a mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byis de
da shes rab kyi bar la tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i nem pangashes pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/
rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying po mamachis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings
zla dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon yod pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha grol tu phyin pa la spyod//
bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ rtsa'i rnam pa shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsoganyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ ragalus pa nyid dang/ snying pomamachis pa nyid dang/
dbazhinanyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin dri dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin de dang chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon ma
N+NaM panyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis khyabanga'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod dmA/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes
pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rag lus pa nyid dang/ stod pom mchos pa nyid dang/ de bzhinanyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/
gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyi ti dang/ chos kyi dgyengs dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i thab dang/ bsam gyis/
mi khyab pa'i dbyaris deng ga la kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ni lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong panyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsobu nyid dang
rag lus pa'od dang/ snying po ma'achis pa nyid dang/ de bkan nyid dang/ ma rnyed pa de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan mA ya/na padi bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/
chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ nyes skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyabanga' dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'bar de ni ma yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ca lags/ mgagi 'dus te reg pa'i stong po nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang
gsob nyid dang/ rag lus ba nyid dang/ snying po man chis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin de dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa da gin nyid dang chos nyin dang chos kyi dbang
dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ nyes skyon med pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod dam// bcom
ldan 'dasaci logs/ rnaba'i 'dus te rig ba'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang/ rigalus pa nyid dang/ snying po ma mchis pa
ya nyidi dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhinaMnyid dang/ gzhan m yin pa de bzhinatid dang/ chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med
panyad dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodam/ bcom ldan 'das cilags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob nyid dang rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying bo mamanyis pa nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang//
thagazhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang// chos nyid dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bas
gyisam khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da// bcom ldan 'dasaci lags/ lca'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid dang/ gsog nyid dang/ gsob
nyid dang rag lus pa nyid dang/ snying bo'amachos nyid dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnar ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid
