pa rab 'byor de rje snyam du sems chos gang dmigs sum pa de skye ba la// 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de nim lugs so// bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mi skyo ba'i tshes la bzod pa thob ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
sams dpakha sanas dang 'chan po ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor 'di na stobs bcu dang 1 mi
'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'a chen po nadi ltar spyod/
daltar rtse'// de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyus kyi ye shes/ yoshes chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongashes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya/
tsha45 ba'i gnas med do// daci'i phyir zhan/ ngani 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ gi chos de dag ni sman yod pa yang dag/
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dasatsalegs/ chos thams
cad kyi mi skya ba nyid gang lags pa de lasu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur tam/ tsem ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i gas/ skye ba yang ma'ags/ mi slu ba yangs lags pa la// byang chub sems dpa' sums
dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor don ma yin no// gsolang/ bcom ldan 'das
gal taskya ba yang ma lags/ mi skya pa yAng ga 'gas pa las kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstunan/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de rje snyam du
sems3 gang blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa///
ma bcom ldan 'adas darim lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma
mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ gnangen par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyib de lta bu'i
ches kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin na// da de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub
sams dpa' sums dpa' chen pon/ 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar

bya'o zhes bya bar mi sums so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'diltar byang chub sems dang la sogs dang 'chan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad mad
pa'i phyir to/ 8ci'i phyir zhan/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha khel tu phyin pana rnam par mi rtog pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bzhi bcu drug go
ca0/de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'dasu shes rab/
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shin tu dben pa'i slad du blta dka' bgo/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na na tudaban pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi/
pha rol tu phyin pa na shani tu dban pa'i slad du brtag tu mumachis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha lo du phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul mu'alags nga 'o// bcom ldan

'dasu shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dbon ba'i slad du zhu ba phra bu zhib pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tudaban ba'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang zhing klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ da bzhin dunan tan bgyid cing/ bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi gud du/ samasu dang/ mas las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tham dang ldan bag lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ke'u shika de de bzhin no// ded bzhin// soms can gang shesaMrab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang zhing klog pa dang/
/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du nan tan byed cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las

byung ba'i tshos gzhan gyi goma'ibyed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka de jisnyam du sus/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems na gang ji snyad pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi
tsholas dang ldan par gyur/ gsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshadamadapa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs mdang/ 'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga
dang ldan par gyur/ gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing bamang la// klogacing kun chub par byed par gyur te// bzung zhing bcangs te/
bkags shing kun chub par bas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ ko'u shi ka dag bu'irtsi ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ brgya'i cher yang nye bar mi 'gro'i/ stong gi char yang

chu bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nyabar mi grogo bya ba'i char yang nyabar mi 'gre'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi grego/ bya ba stong gzhir yang nye ba na mi 'gro'i// bya ba brgya phrag
stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gre'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gre'o// grangs dang/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang mkhi'od do/
de nas dge slong gcig gis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin l 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka'adzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad
yod pa bzhi dang ldan pa// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ganga shes rab kyi pha lo
tu phyin pa zab mo 'dami g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing/
blun mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sams dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go ga'i byed ba de dag gis zil gyis gnonani// daskad
tsas smras pa dang/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis/ ga slong da la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi
dang ldanel/ tshadanodapa bzhi dang ldan ba/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang khra'i gyisanonan/ gang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ]
kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang/ bzung zhing bcangs te/ bkru kagung kun chub par bsams kyang/ dbazhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang/
dus ci dgos te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten hril gyisanon par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpasogs ya chen po des ni lha dang/ mi dang/ lham An du bcas pa'i 'jig rten/
zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyu'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang/ mi deng lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnanacing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems
dpa' sums dpa' chen po dan rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcos pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyad pa de dag thams cad kyang bril gyis mnan cing
'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ gra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas su gang yang ma zad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan

bad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brel ba gang ji snyadang de dag kyang zil
gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i 'ol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad do/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po gang tshul

khrims kyi ba 'og tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs m bas pa dang bral ba/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gangaji snyad pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi ba/
la tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'a chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i phral tu phyin pal spyodang/ thabs
mkhas pa dang bral la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang bril gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ khabyed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yong ma zad da/
byang chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang brol ba/ shes rab kyil
la tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyad pa de dag kyang zilagyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi phongol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa'
chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodang// thabs makhas pa dang bral kha/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang
ji snyad pa de dag kyang khrilagyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol
datuphyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gyur pa dag nilha dang/ mi dang/ lhag in du bcas pa'i 'jig rtan gyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ byang chub semasu/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sags dpa' sems dpa' chen
bod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi rigs rgyun gcod pa'i don du gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po den/ dbu ni gshigs pa ring du mi byed pa'o// de ltar
zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod nga//
de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang dug soms dang 'i nga ba po' slog pa ste/ nyanabyes kyi bslab pa la gling pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa
ma yin no// deltaslob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i drung du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar gnas ta/ nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen

po myur du slobs shagi/ skyes bu chen po skrun par slobs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyi snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas nas byang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang zhes pa'ozhes zerazhing ston to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/

la spyod ba'i byang nub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar soms so// de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum

gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab mtshon yang mtshonA'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sams so// lha'i rgyal por ba dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang
lhan cig 'gro bar soms go/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dag la ya nga ba tshul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar soms so/ lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'abu
rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sams go// tshangs patsha mdzad kyi bdag po yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan g 'gro bar soms so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang bar 'dong bar soms
so dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang bar 'dong bar sumusus// 'bras bu cha bu'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar soms so// mi tshe ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// mi gdung ba'i wA
rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sogs so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang 'bar 'deng bar sams so gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nyi bar 'dang bar sems so// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar soms so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa brab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ dbazhin gshegs pa
rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus ni/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis

gnod par byas pa gang ji snyad cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa 'tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyid pa 'di lta ste/ mig gnad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam ka
lus kyi nad dam// snying gi nad gang ji snyad pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'da'
spyod pa'i tshi/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// de nas tshodang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dirang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ston cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang 'gas pa brjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang/ danas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis [7 ]tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba'i
samasakyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang/ shes rab kyi
tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pan sangs rgyas kyil thur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tsha dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo de de bzhin no//

dadabazhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byani shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab tshe 'dasten pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang gas pa brjod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu/
na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// dga' bo gang gi tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang/ shas rab kyi pha rol tu

zhib la brtson par byed pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi steng nan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig todon gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad tsi/ byang
chub san sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lanacig phyir bod pa'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra
bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur rag/ 'on tam yin gyis/ bani yod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dog pa snyad par
'gyur ro// dga' bo ga nyan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi/

drug rdzus zug par 'gyur ro// dga' ba gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ba ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ bdud sdig to can nis kyang byang chub sems dang ' gnas dpa'/
po 'di rnam pa thams can ma khyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las/ sems gcig tsam bkrug par 'gyur pa dang/ zhum par 'gyur ba dang/ spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa/
bskyed de// danas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags 1 byang chub snyams dpa' sems dang 'chan po thams cad kyi drung du/ bdud sdig
tecan gang gtso'i bsam pas 'chi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig tetsanagatso ba'i
bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchibar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dga' po byang chub sems dpa' gang gis

sngonagyi bla rang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtso ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong go/ dga' ba gzhan yang byang chub sems

00/dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam// 'on tamam yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtso ba'i
bsam ngag nye bar 'ongang// dga' ba gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' dge ba'i lo shes gnyen dang bralan dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen tsha mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha 'o tu phyin pa zab mo 'di//
thos so/ chathos pas mi shes so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa mngashas bsA/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed do/ dga' bo byang chub sems dang la yang bdud sdig tenAn
gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' ba gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sogs/
dang 'a de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dang 'a dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa
brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sams te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grog sa yin te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni
byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grags su rnyed ba ste/de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyis dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis//
[S ]@#// las gcig tu gnas par gyur ba// de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'o snyam ste/ dga' ba byang chub gnas dang ba de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags
rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' kho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhan/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshi/
'di skad du shes rab pha rol tu phyin pani shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pa rel tu phunang khrab mo 'di thos pas khyod ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang/ bzung ba dang/ bklags pa dang/ kun chub

par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de gting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzha/

yang gang gi tsha/ byang chub semasu dpa' sems dpa' chan pa gzhan la byang nubasams dpa' rnyed pa bskyod cing/ ngani sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

dpal spyad pa'o// ngani bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nga pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// ngano bsam gtan gyi pha 'o tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pa la'o tu phyin pa la spyod pam yin no// khyod na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa ma yin

[s no khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin// khyod na bsam gtan gyi bzol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin//khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su phyidan/ga' bo byang rgyu/

ams dpa' de la yang bdud sdig ton gyis klag rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gragang gi tso/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom semasu bskyodan draga' po de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga'
pa dang/ spro ba dang/ nyams bde ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ tshim zhing yadi bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub soms dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to nan gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur
ro dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dang 'i ming brjod pa 'an/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyuran/ de ming brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa'i
sams dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang/ tshul dang/
mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang/ de la med par rnam pa dang/ tshul dang mtshan ma mad pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing/ bdag bstod ga zhan smod de de skad du ji ltar du byang chub
sams dpa'i theg pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo/ byang chub sems pa'i rigs la gnas
par mi snang ngo zhas de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag mi snyan par brjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig tecan 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs/
bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang/ byol song gi skyo gnas dang/ gshing rjes 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul yang shin tu 'phar bar 'gyur ro zhes// cis kyang de'i tshig

gzung du rung bar 'gyur bar ltade ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlobaste/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang ma nyan pa dang/ yid ches par bya bar soms te/

da la de dag gis thos sama mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob sto/ de dag de bzhin du slob pa ba'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid du slob
cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed nga 'i tsho/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phal bar 'gyur tu/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci 'gatu gyur pas lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa/
de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ sid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar na sumasacan dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phal bar 'gyur/ ngel seng gi skye gnas pa//
dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnasakyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' ba don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig

ba//donan dag/'kha dang/ spro ba dang/ tshig pa dang/ yang bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba gzhan yang gal te gang brag khung chub sems dpa'i theg pa la// gang brag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing
nga nanachog tu gyur ba yin gyi/ khyod nam yin no zhes TeranA/ del bdud sdig tocan 'di snyam du sunas te/ kyarigs kyi 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed r sta/ 'di ni rnam/
pa thams cad mkhyenang nyidakyilam ma yin te/ ci'i phrogazhan/ 'thabam dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi'am ma yin
te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba lamano// dan byol song gi skyo gnas kyi lamamo// da ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'am mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i las ma yanano snyam du sems par 'gyur
ra dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa pa dang/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la'akhrugatsang mtshang 'dru na/ dal bdud sdig to can
gad snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rang du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
rgya'i datsa'i phyir zhan/ 'daltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi'am ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang
tsa0 @#// byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhus nas dga' zhing sgrub dang/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyulo// dga' kho gzhan yang gal/
ba dbyung chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sams shing/ 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrugacing mtshang 'dun/ gal tedas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
panyid longs su ma gtang zhin/ tsal du sgrig pa'i sems brgyad pa skyes pa dang/ 'brab cing rtsod pa dang/ 'khrug cing mtshang 'dra bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par gom bgo bar bya'o// dga'
bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te ma lags kyis/ bskol pa de snyad kho nar go chab go 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// dga' bo gang zaganyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos
bstan te/ dga' bo da lagang thag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang brag dang ba thabacing rtsod la/ ga zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang/ 'thab cing rtsod de
gshib dang/ mi snyan par brjod par byas nas// phyir 'chags par 'dud par 'dzin cing khon du 'dzin ta gnas ni dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi sna ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa

khrags can mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gi gtabazhin/ gden gyi khri bar bskal pa de g+had du go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang/ mi snyan/
bar brjod par gyur na yang 'dud par mi 'dzinal/ phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing/ bdag gisanathob bar bya ba legs par ma thob ste/ bdag gisasems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dag
na/ daltar bdag smras pa laphyir smra ba dang/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rtsom par gyur pa bya dgos na/ deltar bdag gzhan la snyan par smra zhing phyir zlog panamo tshul gyis/ bdag gis da
ltar mi khyi'i/ bdag gi glen pa deng lkug pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gi bsam pa 'a 'khrug pa med par bgo/ sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis blan/de pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su myun las bzla bar bya dgos na/ dadag nyid la bdag ngan sunas su byed pa dang/ de dag gnyid la bdag 'khrug pani tshul ma yin gyis/ bdag gis
de dag laganod sems su mkhya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug bar mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de' ni bdud sdige

dotsan gags ltazhing glags tshol bas kyang gsanyid do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa po dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o// de dag dang lhan[H]
i du gnas bar mi bya'o// 'dug par mkhye'o/ gal te 'dug n yang dus su la yang gnod sems su khyo/ 'khrug khang gi ko/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la

gnod sems su bya ba dang/ 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la ma tshul lo// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis blanam da ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tungon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/
sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag gisnyan du bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das dzaltar byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang nub sams
dbo'i thig pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ba 'dilta ste/ dpar na ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
gang brag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ daci'i phyir zhen/ 'a de ni bdag gi grogs te/ gru gtsug tu zhugs bgo/ 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang

bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa

thabs stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ grog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang///

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo banyidi stong panyid dang/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid dang/ dran pa nyibar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs ldadang/ byang chub
kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bangan pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshadamed pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
baba'i dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par myur ba'i sgo stong ba ni dang/ mtshan mamadapa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/
nan par shes pa lnga dang/ ting nge 'dzin thamasacud dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag bar
rig pa bzhi deng/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lan gyi rnam pa shes panyid dang/
pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/
'dani yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyalam ston pa lta/ gal ted 'dres par spyod cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ dil bdag gis
zlu/ bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas ni/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab
par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa nyid yin no// shes rab kyi pha bol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las la'u
bo bzhi bcu gdun no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam ponyis brgya nyilnga pa/// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pos mnyam pa nyidi gang 'dra bslab par bgyi ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan M 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byoranang stong ba nyidi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam

nga nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi gnyam panyid do// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gnyam pa/

nyid do/ rab 'byor stong ranyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chen po stong panyidan byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chemago rnams kyi
mnyam panyid do// rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sags dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyam pa de do// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid byang chub sems dpar sams dpa'
chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab ba byol dusum byas stong pa nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po rnams kyimanyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mtha'alas 'das pa stong pa nyide na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'a byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam panyid do// rab
'byor der ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan bo rnams kimanyam
pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyidan khying chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam ba nyid do/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dbab sams
[r/ ]@#// dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyam pa nyid do// rab 'a byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyimanyam pa nyid do// rang 'byor dngos bo med nga
stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab
zla 'byor dngos po nang pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ tshor bani tsher bas stong/
za 'du shes ni 'du shesakyis stong/ 'du byed na 'du byed kyis stong/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa sa stong mi ni mig gis stong/ rnakhanani bas stong snani smos stong/ lcani lcas/
stong lus ni lus kyis stong/ yid ni yid kyis stong gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ sgrani sgras stong drin dris stong/ ronaris stong rig ni rig gis stong/ des ni ches
k+Sha kyis stong/ mig gi rnam pa gzhas pa nam rnam par shes pas stong/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong/ sna'i rnam par shes bani sna'i
rnam par shes pas stong/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lca'i rnam par shes pas stong/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nilus kyi rnam par shes pas stong/ yidikyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi
ma/ rnam par shes ngas stong/ mig gi lo dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te rig pas stong/ rna ba'i 'dus te reb pan rno ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong/ sna'i 'dus te reg ba ni sna'i 'a dus te reg pas/
stong [.]lca'i 'dus te reg panalce'i 'dus te rig pas stong/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa na lus kyi 'dus te rig pas stong/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig ga'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba ni re ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong sna'i

'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong/ lci'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong/ lus kyi 'dus
ta rog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor bas stong/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba na yod kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong/ sa'i khams
nasa'i khams kyis stong/ nu' khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong/ mi'i khamasani mi'i khams kyis stong/ rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong/ namam pa'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams/
kyis stong/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa/rags pa'i khams kyis stong/ ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas ]
stong ming dang gzugs na ming dang ga blugs kyis stong/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong/ rig pun rig pas stong/ tshor ba ni tsher bas stong/ srid pa/
zla ni srid pas stong/ len pa ni len pas stong/ srid pa ni srid pas stong/ skyabanaskya bas stong/ gshin rga shis stong/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong//

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus/

kyil la tu phyin pas stong/ bsamA ga tan gyi pha gol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nangashis ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong/ nang stong

pa nyid nanang stong pa nyid kyis stong/ phyi stong pa nyidan phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong/ phyi nang stong pa nyid na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa stong pa nyid kyis stong/ tshan

po stong pa nyid natshan bo stong pa nyid kyis stong/ don dam pa stong pa nyaden don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong/ 'dus ma byas stong ba
nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong thogam dang thamamad pa stong pa nyidan thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa/

ba ]nyid kyis stong/ dor ba med pa stong nyid ni der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong/ chos thams cad stong pa nyidan ches thams cad stong pa nyid kyis//

stong rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyidi ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gong/ dngos po yod pa stong pa nyid ni dengos bo med pa stong pa nyid

kyis stong/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyis stong/ dran pa nyibar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa
nyo bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong/ rdzu 'a phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi rdzu 'phrul rkang ba rnams kyis stong/ dbang po rnams ni
dbang po rnams kyis stong/ stobs rnams n stobs rnams kyis stong byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong/ lamanalam gyis stong/ 'phags pa'i bden
pa rnams na 'phags pa'i bdan pa rnams kyis stong bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong/ tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong/ gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasun
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyams par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pas stong/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong/ ting nga' rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong/ gzungs
( kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong/ mi 'jigs pa rnags ni 'jigs pa rnams
kyis stong/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong/ byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong/ snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen posastong/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adras pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong/ lanatsag phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong 1 phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rgyu'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong/ dgra bcom pa nyidi ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong/ rang byang chub ni
rang byang chub kyis stong/ lamakyi rnam pa shes panyidan lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong/ rnam pathams cad makhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/rab 'byor
'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par/
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das tsalegs byang chub sogs dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs gas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams
cad makhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i smad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad
du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mu skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi
ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags gan/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i spyod du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i gid du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyikha'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyididu slob pa lags
sam/ 'du shes bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams
cad makhyen pa nyid du slob ba lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i smad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i//
slad du glob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sam/ 'du byed bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang
bral bar bgyi ba'i slod du sloban/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed bgag par bgyi ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
'du byed kyi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'apyid du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
lags su// rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sug/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pachesgyu bar bgyi ba'i slad dusloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so// mig bas par bgyi ba'i
slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mgi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du globan/ rnam pathams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

tshig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban rnam pa thams cad la phyin pa nyid du slob pa lags nyam/ mig mi u0f7a las bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du glob pa lags la rna ba bas
par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnag 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slongan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/

rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i spyod du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa la gas sam/rna bami skya ra bgyi ba'i slad du sleban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du glob pa lags sam/ sna bas
par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban rnam pa thams cad n khyenabanyid du slob pa lags sam// sna 'dod chags dang srol bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
sna'agag par 'gyo ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du glob pa'i gs snyam/ snamasgyu bar bgyi ba'i slad du glob rnam pa gas cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lugs sam/
lci bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad na/khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca'adod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i sAd du gon/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas
[']sam lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lcami skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gAb pa lags sam//
lus bas bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'as 'dodachags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad dusloban/ rnam pa thams cad/
mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i spyod du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus m skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam grwa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yod bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid mi skye bar
bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
ra/ gzugs 'ded chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ smra bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa[H]
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgra 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sgram skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// dri bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa// dri 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du glob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dri 'gag par bgyi ba'i
slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob ba lugs sam/ dram skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro bas bar bgyi
ba'i sgod du slopa na ( rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ro'adod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob palags ma/
ro'agag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad m/khyen pa nyid du slog pa 'gas sam/ ( rom skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa la gos sam/
rag bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob nga la gas sam/ rig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
pa lags sam/ reg 'gag par bgyi ba'i sud du sleban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rig mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos khas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleban/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam chos 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa la gos sam/ chos m skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// mig gi rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du spro ba na/ rnam pa thams cad ma byin pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang
bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'gag sa par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
lags sam/ mge gi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags su// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa/
[E ]thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa gos sam/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par

zhes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i srid du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pami skye par bgyi ba'i slad du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob ra//
lags sam// sna'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i rgud du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/

rnag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi sku bar
bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca'i rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag pas brgyaba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so// lce'i rnam par shes pa mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bas par
bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag nga ra bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa

mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bas [“] par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa/
lags sam/ yid kyi snom par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi
ba'i slad du sob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// yid kyi rnam par shes pamaskye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
mag gi 'dus te rig pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa 2nas cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
nadAmakhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sAg/ shig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyiba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma sku bar bgyi
ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du glob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
na ba'-i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slobang 'gas samu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sag/ sna'i 'dus te regapa bas par
bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i bu dus ta rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa/
lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa
thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca'i 'dus burag pa 'dong cags
dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid duslob pa lags sam// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad g khyen pa nyid du slob pa
lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa' gas sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam[}]
bu thams cad mkhyen nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du glob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/
bsam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob ba lags sam// 'as kyi 'dus te rig pa mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i spyod du sloban/ rnam ba thams
cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'di kyi 'i dus te rig pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te rag pa 'dod chags dang
phul bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du slob pa lags
sam/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa mi skya par bgyi ba'i srid du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisatshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
sam mig gi'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'agag par bgyi ba'i srid du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bami skye[“]bar

bgyi ba'i sked du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas nga ra bgyi ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/
sum/ rna ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sAg/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
'grag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa// rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
panyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam
pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca dus
ta rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i
slad du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lca' 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thums cad
mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sa// rtse'i 'dus te rig ba'i rkyen gyisatshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnamang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sum/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slapan/ rnam pa thamasacad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus kyi 'dus rta rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du
slobatsan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lugs san/ lus kyi 'dus rdo rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
sam lus kyi 'dus pa rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yade kyi 'dus ta rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bas
thapar bgyi ba'i slad du slobun/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yade kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skyon gyis tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
[4 ]yid kyi 'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi spyi bar bgyi ba'i/ da du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams 'gag/
par bgyi ba'i slad du slob nA/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam sa'i khams mi skya bar bgyi ba'i spang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam//
chu'i khams gas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// chu'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srob pa 'gas lam chu'i khams mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi'i khams bcu par bgyi nga'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thamasaM cud mkhyen pa nyid duslob pa lags sam/ ma'i khams 'dod chags dang
bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ma khams 'gab par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/
sagama'i khams ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rlung gi khams las par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam ]
pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyon nyid du slob ba lags sag/ rlung gi khams 'gag/
bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyanapa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams mi skye bar bgyi bab srid du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu slob pa lags gam/ nam
mkha'i khams gas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyibaslad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad
po mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so// nam kha'i khamasa'agag par bgyi ba'i spyod du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams ga skye bar bgyi ba'i slad
du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam par ngashes pa'i khams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam rnam par
shes pa'i khams 'dodachags dang bral ba bgyi ba'i srid du sloban rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
khrags cad n khyen panyid du slob 'gas sa// rnam pa zhes pa'i khams ma skyi bar bgyiba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa lags sam/ ma rig pa bas par bgyi ba'i
slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa 'gas sam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ ma gi
ba 'gagapar bgyi ba'i sad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ma rig pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid du slob pa lags sam/

nyid du glob pa lags sam// 'du byed 'gas par bgyi ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa

bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid duslob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa lags
sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srid du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob nga la gas sam/ ming dang ga blugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i spyod du slong na/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen nganyid du slob pa la gag gam/ ming dang gzugs
'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so// ming dang gzugasami skyo bar bgyi ba'i slod du slob na/ rnam pa thamasacad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
sam skya mchad drug bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mched drug 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'islad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skye mched drug 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skya'achad drug mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam/
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rig pa bas par bgyi ba'i sad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa'i gs sam/ reg pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cadomakhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rig pa ni[I]
rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du globan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa/ tshor ba
'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slopa pa lags sam// tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad go na pa nyid du slob pa
lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'id du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad na/khyen pa nyid du slob palags sam/ srid pa bas par bgyi ba'i spyod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen banyid

ba thams cad mkhyen ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ srid pa mi skya bar bgyi ba'i slad du sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lanapa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du glob na/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ len pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du globan/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du glob ba lags sam/ len pa 'gag par gyi

bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad m byanapa nyid du slob pa yanenam/ ming dang gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ming dang

gzugasam skye bar bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skya mched drug zad par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skya

mched drug 'dod zhugs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skyo mchad drug 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob

[l]nam reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ga pa 'gag par byakha'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid du slob

0 pa yin nam/ reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa yin nam/ ]

chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa yin// srid pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa yin nam/ da

bar bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yinen// sridab zad par bya ba'i phyirisloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa 'dod chags dang

srid pa'i skye bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen panyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba phrad par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skyo ba 'dod chags dang bral

bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skya ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid du slob pa yin nam/ skya bam skyo bar bya ba'i phyi'i slob na/

da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi brad par bya ba'i phyir slog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga sha 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rgya shimi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa 'di du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral
bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sbyin pa'i pha la tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyi'i sloban ( rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam//

nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin kha gag

par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/

bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khrad par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyi'i sloban/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid duslob ba yin nam/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir
sloban rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grusakyi parol tu phyin pa bad par bya ba'i phyir sloban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus
